question: Will MrBeast's next Youtube video get over 50M views in its first week?
description:
This market asks if the next YouTube video posted by the MrBeast verified YouTube account will have over 50,000,000 views at any time within the first 7 days it is posted.

If the next video posted by the MrBeast verified YouTube account has over 50,000,000 views at any time within the first 7 days it is posted, this market will resolve to “Yes”. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

As of this market’s posting, the first video posted after March 14, 2022, by the MrBeast verified YouTube account will be the video this market will base its resolution on.

Only videos posted to the MrBeast verified YouTube account will count toward the resolution of this market. Any video posted on any account or channel affiliated with the verified MrBeast channel or MrBeast himself but not posted by the MrBeast verified YouTube account will not count toward the resolution of this market.

The resolution source for this market will be the verified MrBeast YouTube account (https://www.youtube.com/c/MrBeast6000/featured). Once a new video is posted, the “views” counter will be checked at 12:00:00 PM ET each day, starting the day after the video is posted, for a week. For example, if the video is posted on March 17, at 10 AM ET, or March 17, 4 PM ET, the first check will be at 12:00 PM ET, March 18, and so on until the final check on March 24, 12:00 PM ET.

If the video is deleted during the week time, the market will resolve 50-50. If YouTube is down or otherwise unavailable on the time of the final check, market resolution will be delayed for up to 3 days. If YouTube is still unavailable at that time, this market will resolve to 50-50. If, when checked on any of those three days allotted for a delay, over 50,000,000 views is recorded by YouTube, this market will resolve to "Yes".

If the MrBeast verified YouTube account does not post any new video by July 1, 2022, this market will resolve 50-50.

If YouTube is still unavailable at that time, this market will resolve to 50-50. If, when checked on any of those three days allotted for a delay, over 50,000,000 views is recorded by YouTube, this market will resolve to "Yes".

If the MrBeast verified YouTube account does not post any new video by July 1, 2022, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will the bill making Daylight Savings Time permanent be signed into law by April 30, 2022?
description:
On March 15, 2022 the Senate of the United States of America passed S.623 - Sunshine Protection Act of 2021 by Unanimous Consent, meaning not a single senator voted against this bill. It now moves onto the House for another vote. This bill, if signed into law, will make Daylight Savings Time permanent, meaning Americans will no longer have to set their clocks forward and back in accordance with the law.

This market asks whether S.623 - Sunshine Protection Act of 2021 is signed into law by US President Joseph Biden by April 30, 2022.

If S.623 - Sunshine Protection Act of 2021 is signed into law by April 30, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to “Yes”. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the United States Congress (https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/senate-bill/623?q=%7B%22search%22%3A%5B%22sunshine+protection+act%22%2C%22sunshine%22%2C%22protection%22%2C%22act%22%5D%7D&s=1&r=1), however other credible reporting may also be considered.

question: NHL: Will the Wild beat the Bruins by more than 1.5 goals in their March 16 matchup (7.30 PM ET)?
description:
In the upcoming NHL game, scheduled for March 16:

If the Minnesota Wild win by over 1.5 goals, the market will resolve to “Yes”.

If the Boston Bruins lose by less than 1.5 goals or win, the market will resolve “No.” 

If the game is not completed by March 23, 2022 (11:59:59 PM ET), the market will resolve 50-50.
